title: GlobalProtect
extract: Define the GlobalProtect Agent Configurations. After a GlobalProtect user connects to the portal and is authenticated by the GlobalProtect portal, the portal sends the agent configuration to the agent or app, based on the settings you defined.Dec 13, 2018
extract_html: Define the GlobalProtect Agent Configurations. After a GlobalProtect user connects to the portal and is authenticated by the GlobalProtect portal, the portal sends the agent configuration to the agent or app, based on the settings you defined.Dec 13, 2018
